name: Walk to the city or beach 4
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is 2.5 miles from the city center. You can access all neighborhoods in Boston by train, bus, uber/lyft and Hubway, seasonal rental bikes. The neighborhood provides bars and restaurants, and shopping.  There are a couple of parks close by, coffee shops, and walking distance to the beach, where you can take a nice long walk to Castle Island or JFK Library.
description:
Centrally located 2 family home, walking distance to the beach, restaurants, museums, colleges, bars, & historic landmarks. Access all forms of public transportation & major highways in minutes. Street parking available.

The space
Carpeted room located on first floor of our home . There is a king size bed that can sleep a total of 3. Free wifi, an iron , and a blow dryer . There is also a shared kitchen and bathroom.

Guest access
You can access the shared kitchen and two shared kitchens .

Other things to note
Should you choose to stay with us please have a fully complete profile and valid ID. If youâ€™re local to the Greater Boston area, please do not autobook and reach out to us and let us know the reason for your stay.
